comment: The main text box containing Chinese characters in a grid layout, with small square frames around each character or group of characters, typical of classical Chinese dictionaries like the Shuowen Jiezi. The text includes both large seal script characters and smaller explanatory text in regular script, arranged vertically. There are annotations such as '文四' (four characters), '重一' (first repetition), and phonetic notations like '切'. The right margin contains vertical annotations including '小口', '言三', and '春高', likely indicating page or section markers.
